title: Lookin for fellow Bronzies lookin to climb
body: After getting into a recent losing slump partially attributed to ridiculous afks and resulting tilt, I'm just looking for some fellow mates that are enthusiastic about the game but not as enthusiastic about the fact they are in Bronze and would like to climb. I main Top and Mid, formerly a Support main. My IGN is Warm0nger, am active in late afternoons and nights and early mornings during the weekends. Preferably JGs or Mids so we can try our best to duo carry!

replies.body: I'm Silver 4 atm, I'm a support main and I would love to play ranked with you :D Add me pls!
Bruh I'm not even ranked yet can I still join
